headline: Pegasystems, Nutanix, LiveRamp, Palo Alto Networks, and Zoom Stocks Trade Up, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks jumped in the afternoon session after analysts suggested that the recent "SaaSpocalypse" sell-off had pushed valuations into deeply oversold territory, sparking a wave of opportunistic buying.

headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Bullish on Palo Alto Networks Stock?
summary: Palo Alto Networks has underperformed the broader market over the past year, yet analysts remain highly bullish about the stock’s prospects.

headline: Morgan Stanley says buy these 9 AI-hit software stocks on discount
summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley believes the sharp pullback in software valuations has created buying opportunities across nine major technology names, arguing that fears around generative AI disruption have gone too far.

headline: Barclays Maintains Overweight on Palo Alto Networks, Lowers Price Target to $200
summary: Barclays  analyst Saket Kalia   maintains Palo Alto Networks (NASDAQ:PANW) with a Overweight and lowers the price target from $230 to $200.

headline: EXCLUSIVE: Reliance Global To Acquire Control Of Post-Quantum Cybersecurity Firm Enquantum
summary: Reliance Global Group (NASDAQ: EZRA) to acquire majority interest in Enquantum Ltd., a post-quantum cryptography firm, to address growing need for secure encryption in the era of quantum computing. Financial terms: $2.125 million for 51% ownership, with additional issuances to reach 51%.
